trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The dryad has advantage on saving throws against spells and magical effects.

trait.name: Speak with Nature
entries: The dryad can communicate with beasts and plants.

trait.name: Fungal Pathway
entries: Once per turn, the mykand can use 10 feet of movement to enter a mushroom ring and then teleport up to 30 feet away.

trait.name: Web Walker
entries: The mykand ignores movement restrictions caused by webbing.

action.name: Club
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Sling
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 3} to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d4 + 1}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Dragon's Head Mushroom (3/Day)
entries: Plucking a red-topped mushroom that bears a loose similarity to a dragon's head from a hidden pocket, the mykand throws it at a spot it can see within 30 feet where it bursts, releasing a cloud of black spores in a 10-foot radius. Each creature in the area aside from a mykand must make a {@dc 13} Wisdom saving throw. On a failure, the creature is {@condition frightened}. While {@condition frightened} in this way, it regards any Dragon's Head Mushrooms it can see with abject terror, and must use its movement each turn to get out of sight of it. A creature can repeat this saving throw if the mykand or the mykand's allies harm it, ending the effect on a success. Otherwise, the effect lasts 24 hours. If the creature succeeds on a saving throw against the Dragon's Head Mushrooms or the effect ends for it, it is immune to Dragon's Head Mushrooms for 24 hours.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The raptor has advantage on attack rolls against a creature if at least one of the raptor's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and not {@condition incapacitated}.

trait.name: Wall Walker
entries: The spawn can use its climb speed even on difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Kanos spawn makes two attacks with its claws.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3}) slashing damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it makes a {@dc 13} Strength saving throw, falling {@condition prone} on a failure.

action.name: Icy Breath (Recharge 6)
entries: The spawn releases an icy blast of frigid air in a 20-foot cone. All creatures in the area must make a {@dc 14} Constitution saving throw, taking 10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) cold damage and becoming {@condition restrained} by a layer of ice on a failure. On a succcess, the creature takes half damage and is not {@condition restrained}. Creatures remain {@condition restrained} for 1 minute or until they spend an action to free themselves.
Until the start of its next turn the area is lightly obscured and the spawn can use a bonus action to attempt to hide, making its Stealth check with advantage.
